subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Every time Joba Chamberlain pitches for the Yankees, John Fitzpatrick, a Class A first baseman in the Pittsburgh Pirates’ organization, is reminded of his brief, brilliant history against him.
snippet: Every time Joba Chamberlain pitches for the Yankees, John Fitzpatrick, a Class A first baseman in the Pittsburgh Pirates’ organization, is reminded of his brief, brilliant history against him.
